channel.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
channel.description: Hello, I'm writing a 317 framework, because I don't like the current ones. So I have got the login to start, and to load the gameframe, but it fails to load the sidebars. Now, I'm not expecting to see the landscape, or the player right now, I just want to know why the sidebars aren't loading. Do I need to make like an updatePlayer void or something, or is it something else?

item.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well, Like I said “From scratch”. I bs’ed the Login(Client) from the wl, Cadmium, and Emulous servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You are way out of your league with this one

If you can’t do this, how did you ever get the server to send the client the proper login information…?

item.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:278985”][quote author=48 Jumps link=topic=368213.msg2788906#msg2788906 date=1242616845]
You need an appearance update.

EDIT: I’ve never worked on a 508.
[/quote]
didnt u see that he said hes working on a 317??[/quote]

Ok… sorry I thought it said 508. Don’t have an aneurysm.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 09:26:42 pm[/size][hr] public void initialize(Player player) { outStream.createFrame(249); outStream.writeByteA(1); // 1 for members, zero for free outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(player.getIndex()); sendFrame107(player); // reset screen setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern setSidebarInterface(7, 1); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); setSidebarInterface(12, 147); setSidebarInterface(13, 6299); player.isOnline(true); flushOutStream(player); flushOutStream(npc); flushOutStream(); }

Try that.

Declare

item.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

public void initialize(Player player) { outStream.createFrame(249); outStream.writeByteA(1); // 1 for members, zero for free outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(player.getIndex()); sendFrame107(player); // reset screen setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern setSidebarInterface(7, 1); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); setSidebarInterface(12, 147); setSidebarInterface(13, 6299); player.isOnline(true); flushOutStream(player); }

That’s my initialize method. It still doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Failing login(Fail to set sidebars)
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
setSidebarInterface(9, 5715);
setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

Sorry I don’t have the summoning tab ID. If you are writing a framework you shouldn’t need me to rename the setSidebarInterface. Good-luck on your server. If you already have this and it still isn’t working then post your initialize method.

Read full topic
